Health
?
Your character dies when this reaches 0. Lose 1 dice from your Body Pool per 10 health lost.
Max:
Sanity
?
Your character goes insane and will likely die when this reaches 0. Lose 1 dice from your Mind Pool per 10 sanity lost.
Max:
Fatigue
?
Measure of exhaustion - each point of fatigue increases the dice face used for all rolls by 1, which reduces the chance of getting a success.
Actions
?
Track the number of actions you've taken this turn
Max:
